external_games.name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Gakuensai no Ouji-sama

name: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Gakuensai no Ouji-sama
storyline: The Atobe group has decided to sponsor a school festival which involves the local schools’ tennis teams. You are a 14 year old heroine who is in charge of managing a team and the festival. Your duties include arranging activities, and organizing people. You’ll have to get in contact with the members of the team so they can lend a hand, get to know one another, chat with them, and maybe even develop an intimate relationship with one of them…
summary: Tennis no Ouji-sama: Gakuensai no Ouji-sama is an otome game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2005.
